summary:
Robber's Roost - current version is v1.26

A habitable, old delapidated barn situated deep inside Falkreath Hold.

This run-down building has become a magnet for unsavoury characters. Rumour has it around Falkreath that it's currently inhabited by bandits.

Includes bedrolls, smithing tools & storage.
descriptionHtml:
Robber's Roost - current version is v1.26

A habitable, old delapidated barn situated deep inside Falkreath Hold.

This run-down building has become a magnet for unsavoury characters. Rumour has it around Falkreath that it's currently inhabited by bandits.

Includes bedrolls, smithing tools & storage.

n.b. the grass coming through the floor & missing top exterior roof panels are deliberate features to give the look of an old decaying building.

*Latest version has been cleaned with TES5Edit (see changelog below for details)

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url][/center]

A big thank you to Ka3mOn for considering Robber's Roost to be featured on his Skyrim GEMS site.

22/7/12 - PLEASE NOTE - *IF ANYONE HAS A ROBBERSROOST.BSA FILE IN THEIR SKYRIM/DATA FOLDER, THEN PLEASE JUST DELETE IT, AS THAT SHOULD NEVER HAVE BEEN INCLUDED IN THE UPLOAD!*

(ONLY THE ROBBERSROOST.ESP FILE IS NEEDED)

-------
F.A.Q.
-------

Q. Will the bandits respawn?
A. No.

----------------------
Changelog
----------------------
v1.1
*flickering issue with wall panel at lower left front of building has been corrected.
*I have 'relayed' the floor with lighter coloured pinewood floorboards, which I think looks a lot better (and no more flickering floor issue whereby I'd accidentally layed down 2 floor pieces immediately on top of one another previously).
*There's now a hole in the floor beneath the stairs, hopefully adding slightly to the 'decaying building' look.
*A grindstone has been added.
*Added 2 bird nests in the hayloft also.

v1.2 - 28/2/12
**Complete Navmesh overhaul** Hand Navmeshed whole of interior and large area around exterior of building. NPC movement will now be much better.

v1.21 - 28/2/12
*More extensive Navmesh coverage around exterior of building to boundaries of the RobbersRoost Tamriel worldspace cell.

v1.25 - 30/3/12
Added night lighting effects for lanterns & added two lanterns downstairs. Also added cobweb effects.

v1.251 22/7/12 Minor Navmesh tweaks. Removed .bsa file that should never have been there :-/

v1.26 23/9/13 Cleaned with TES5Edit v3.0.30 Experimental. Removed 14 ITM records, 4 Undeleted records, repaired 1 deleted Navmesh
author: Nick75
